text: Fernando Carlos Maletti (17 March 1949 â€“ 8 March 2022) was an Argentine prelate of the Roman Catholic Church. He was bishop of San Carlos de Bariloche from 2001 until 2013. He later became bishop of Merlo-Moreno. Maletti was born in Buenos Aires. Maletti died on 8 March 2022, at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Argentine Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Buenos Aires
title: Fernando Carlos Maletti
